name: Inspector Baggage
description:
Take on the role of Inspector Baggage, a Security Inspector paid minimum wage to inspect suspicious cargo at a busy airport.

Players must make use of Inspector Baggage's limited arsenal of tools, and his own senses, to inspect each suspicious package and make their best guess as to if it contains dangerous and/or illegal items or not.

Pay attention to Inspector Baggage's facial expressions and reactions as you inspect each piece of cargo, then make your judgement on whether to give the all clear, or flag the object. But don't poke and prod at the objects too much! Each inspection method can cause damage to the object, putting Inspector Baggage's job in danger should he damage innocent cargo too much.

Try to survive on limited clues and take your chances to avoid being blown up, poisoned, assassinated, maimed etc.

How to Play:

When a package arrives in view of the conveyor belt, click a tool to asset the Inspector's face. Their facial reaction will tell you whether the package is safe or not. 

However, most tools will do damage to the package and too much damage will cause loss of score. 

At any time, you can reject or accept the package to continue onwards. Keep playing until time runs out.
